dc_title_s: General map of the North west Territories, including Manitoba shewing Dominion lands
dc_description_s: 1 map : color ; 73 x 110 cm, on sheet 85 x 120 cm|Shows subdivision and outline survey areas, townships and ranges, Indian reserves, mounted police stations, etc.|Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.|At head of title: Dominion of Canada.|Signed by Lindsay Russell, Surveyor General, Dominion Land Office.|Ms. notes in black ink in margins as to revisions and cost of "engraving this map in the best style". Signed: I.I.|Includes index map and references.|On verso, written by hand: Dominion of Canada 1882.
